sub_title: Science specialist and team lead at Aramco Overseas Company
summary: Diego Rovetta is a senior research geophysicist who has been working for Aramco on multi-geophysics integration and joint inversion since 2011. He is currently leading the HPC for Reservoir Technologies focus area at the Aramco global research center in Delft. He previously worked as a researcher for Politecnico di Milano, collaborating with different companies (eni, Saipem, Schlumberger, etc.), and as a geophysicist at the WesternGeco Center of Excellence for electromagnetics. In 2002, he received his MSc. degree in Telecommunications Engineering from Politecnico di Milano, studying non-linear inverse problem applications using Simulated Annealing. In 2006, he obtained his Ph.D. from the same institute in Information Engineering focusing on geophysical inverse problems. Diego founded the EAGE local chapter in the Netherlands that he chaired between 2019 and 2022.

awards: [{'title': '2023 EAGE Best Local Chapter Award', 'description': 'During my chairmanship EAGE Local Chapter Netherlands received the 2023 EAGE Best Local Chapter award', 'issuer': 'European Association of Geoscientists and Engineers ', 'date': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, {'title': '2022 Saudi Aramco EXPEC-ARC Volunteer of the Year Award', 'description': 'Diego Rovetta founded in 2019 the local chapter of the European Association of Geoscientists and Engineers (EAGE) in The Netherlands and he has been its president since then and until December 2022. During his mandate Diego was able to gather more than 100 local professionals and more than 200 followers, organizing more than 40 technical talks on topics going from traditional Oil & gas and near-surface geoscience to recent advances in energy transition, AI, HPC and quantum computing. As a recognition of the excellent results the local chapter Netherlands was awarded by EAGE as "Best Local Chapter Newcomer" in 2021. Diego’s exceptional contribution to the geoscience community in The Netherlands also positively reflected on the company image in terms of high professionalism and commitment to share geoscientific knowledge locally and globally.', 'issuer': 'Saudi Aramco -
